content: catenella blo - solo asola dietro m - maglia flo - solo asola davanti g - giro aum - aumento am - anello magico dim - diminuzione mb - maglia bassa - indica la ripetizione delle mma - mezza maglia alta istruzioni tra parentesi e il numero di ma - maglia alta volte in cui devono essere ripetute mbss - maglia bassissima nello stesso punto o riga english n b this is a no-sew pattern start with the arms and continue to the rest of the body the arms will be joined to the body using the crochet hook round 24 4 single_crochet 1 increase 36 single_crochet arm make 2 round 25 5 single_crochet 1 increase 42 single_crochet using beige yarn round 26 6 single_crochet 1 increase 48 single_crochet round 1 start 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 single_crochet rounds 27-33 48 single_crochet 48 single_crochet round 2-8 6 single_crochet 6 single_crochet fasten_off round 34 6 single_crochet 1 decrease 42 single_crochet round 35 5 single_crochet 1 decrease 36 single_crochet legs make 2 round 36 4 single_crochet 1 decrease 30 single_crochet round 37 3 single_crochet 1 decrease 24 single_crochet using beige yarn round 38 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 18 single_crochet round 1 start 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 single_crochet round 39 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 12 single_crochet round 2 1 single_crochet 1 increase 9 single_crochet round 40 6 decrease 6 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet 1 increase 12 single_crochet close the head sewing leaving a long tail round 4 12 single_crochet 12 at the end of round 4 in the second leg to create the pumpkin bumps run the don t fasten_off and continue with the body yarn inside the magic_ring to the base of body and head the neck and then out at the base and back through the magic_ring until you create a round 5 join the legs join the first leg with 3 line on the side of the head repeat this chain and work 12 single_crochet first leg 3 single_crochet chains 12 single_crochet process 6 times and now the head will have second leg 3 single_crochet chains mark the last st 30 single_crochet the shape of a pumpkin rounds 6-13 8 rounds 30 single_crochet 30 single_crochet >> start stuffing and continue stuffing as you go stalk and leaf round 14 3 single_crochet 1 decrease 24 single_crochet stalk using brown yarn round 15 24 single_crochet 24 single_crochet round 1 start 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 single_crochet round 16 2 single_crochet 1 decrease 18 single_crochet round 2 1 single_crochet 1 increase 9 single_crochet round 17 join the arms 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet body+arm round 3 9 single_crochet 9 single_crochet 6 single_crochet 3 single_crochet body+arm 3 single_crochet 18 single_crochet round 4 1 single_crochet 1 dim 6 single_crochet round 18 1 single_crochet 1 decrease 12 single_crochet round 19 12 single_crochet 12 single_crochet rounds 5-6 6 single_crochet 6 single_crochet round 7 6 increase 12 single_crochet round 20 12 single_crochet 12 single_crochet leave a long tail for sewing change to orange yarn
